main event: A US Navy aviator reported observing a circular, saucer-like object giving off a yellowish light on 12 January 1955.
interesting points: The object moved at slow speed then accelerated to a speed of about 500 mph.,The object climbed at an altitude slightly lower than a jet.,The pilot reported seeing the object hover momentarily before moving off rapidly.,The sighting included visual confirmation by a military aviator.,The document notes insufficient data for a conclusive evaluation.
